General.Name: Banca IFIS S.p.A.
General.Description: Banca IFIS S.p.A. provides credit services and solutions for enterprises. It engages in the purchase/management of non-performing loan portfolios. The company offers factoring, advisory and equity investment, leasing, structured finance, M&A, supply chain, insurance, medium, and long-term financing for industrial investments. Banca IFIS S.p.A. was founded in 1983 and is based in Mestre, Italy. The company operates as a subsidiary of La Scogliera S.p.A.
